summary: Configuration of Categorized Favorites Menu to better suite 1600x1200 resolution
descriptionHtml:
[B][U]Description[/U][/B]

Configuration of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url] to better suite 1600x1200 resolution.

The screens are taken with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2730]Better Sorting[/url] installed. Make sure install this file after that mod if you want it to look like this. It doesn\'t change anything but the look in the favorites menu.

I just made this for myself, and uploaded it because I haven\'t found any suitable config yet and wanted to help others as useless as me in terms of modding. 

[B][U]Installation[/U][/B]

Install Categorized Favorites Menu.
Place favoritesmenu_overrides.cfg in the skyrim\\Data\\Interface folder. Overwrite if there\'s already one present.

[B][U]Uninstalation[/U][/B]

Delete favoritesmenu_overrides.cfg in the skyrim\\Data\\Interface folder and the configuration will turn back to the default Categorized Favorites Menu settings.

[B][U]Credits[/U][/B]
All credits goes to the creator of Categorized Favorites Menu.
author: BareJag
